events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and filed the initial claim with basic accident details.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to involvement of the customer's car in a collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the vehicle accident claim for better support.
The customer received formal acknowledgment of their accident claim and was informed about the next steps.
The agent requested the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance documents to proceed with the investigation.
The customer uploaded all requested documents, including detailed photos and the official police accident report.
The claims investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted witnesses for more information.
The investigation was completed after confirming details of the collision and verifying the extent of vehicle damage.
A settlement offer was formulated based on the damage assessment and coverage limits, sent to the claimant for review.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of their claim.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
The payment for the vehicle repair was processed and issued to the customer within the expected timeframe.
The claim file was closed after full settlement, with confirmation sent to the customer indicating resolution.
